title: Weligama A Piece Of Paradise - LIP 104
details: LIP-104 A beautiful piece of land fantastically positioned on a busy and popular beach and surf spot. Weligama Bay is an interesting lively fishing town and has much to offer for the traveler or holiday maker, perfect for surfing and attracts many beginners for its safety. The land is just 50 m from the main road and surrounded with coconut trees and lush vegetation. 60 perches of beach front property waiting to be developed. Galle Fort is 39km drive away with easy access to the Southern Express way.
